rules_text:
First strike, hexproof
[i]Blade Honor[/i] – Whenever a creature you control with 5 power or greater attacks, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
[i]Crosswise Cut[/i] – Whenever Kamui becomes the target of a spell or ability, he gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
[i]Tigerstance[/i] – Whenever another creature becomes the target of a spell or ability you don't control, Kamui deals 2 damage to each opponent.
